title: University of Hawaii graduate application revolving
context: [ยง304A-2260] University of Hawaii graduate application revolving fund. There is established the University of Hawaii graduate application revolving fund for graduate program application processing. The board of regents may establish appropriate charges for application processing. The revenues from the charges shall be deposited into this revolving fund and shall be used to pay the costs of processing applications to all graduate programs. [L 2006, c 75, pt of ยง2]
